segments.text: Stand back from the door , please . There're plenty of seats in the rear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One yuan fifty cents . Drop it in the box here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this the right bus to Zizhuyuan Park ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take a No . 2 . This is No . 12 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But somebody told me this was the right bus to take . I want to go to Tian'anmen Square , you see .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then this is the right bus . Move on , please . You're holding up the passengers . Tian'anmen Square is the last stop but one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please let me know when we get there ?
segments.speaker: S2
